mapper.select: SELECT c.course_name AS courseName, t.name AS teacherName, g.exam_score AS examScore, g.regular_score AS regularScore, g.extra_score AS extraScore, g.total_score AS totalScore FROM grades g JOIN courses c ON g.course_id = c.id JOIN teachers t ON c.teacher_id = t.id WHERE g.student_id = #{studentId} AND g.course_id = #{courseId}
mapper.update: UPDATE grades SET exam_score = COALESCE(#{examScore}, exam_score), regular_score = COALESCE(#{regularScore}, regular_score), extra_score = COALESCE(#{extraScore}, extra_score), total_score = COALESCE(#{totalScore}, total_score) WHERE student_id = #{studentId} AND course_id = #{courseId}
